name: Spaghetti Bolognese
preparation: Cook pasta, prepare sauce, mix together.

name: Caesar Salad
preparation: Mix all ingredients.

name: Chicken Curry
preparation: Cook chicken, add curry powder and coconut milk.

name: Beef Tacos
preparation: Cook beef, fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
preparation: Stir fry vegetables, serve with rice.

name: Pancakes
preparation: Mix ingredients, cook in a pan until golden brown.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
preparation: Butter bread, add cheese, grill until golden.

name: Tomato Soup
preparation: Cook tomatoes with onion and garlic, blend, add cream.

name: Fried Rice
preparation: Stir fry rice with vegetables and soy sauce, add eggs.

name: Lasagna
preparation: Layer ingredients, bake until golden brown.

name: Greek Salad
preparation: Chop ingredients, mix with olive oil and herbs.

name: Omelette
preparation: Whisk eggs with milk, cook in a pan, add fillings.

name: BBQ Chicken Wings
preparation: Marinate wings, bake or grill until cooked.

name: Caprese Salad
preparation: Slice tomato and mozzarella, layer with basil, drizzle with olive oil.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
preparation: Stuff peppers with mixture, bake until tender.

name: Mac and Cheese
preparation: Cook macaroni, mix with cheese sauce.

name: Chicken Alfredo
preparation: Cook pasta, prepare Alfredo sauce, mix with chicken.

name: Vegetable Soup
preparation: Cook vegetables in broth, season with herbs.

name: Fish Tacos
preparation: Cook fish, assemble tacos with toppings.

name: Chocolate Cake
preparation: Mix ingredients, bake until cooked through.

name: Shrimp Scampi
preparation: Cook shrimp in garlic butter, serve with pasta.

name: Quiche
preparation: Mix filling, pour into crust, bake until set.

name: Beef Stew
preparation: Simmer beef and vegetables in broth until tender.

name: Cobb Salad
preparation: Chop ingredients, arrange on a plate, serve with dressing.

name: Banana Bread
preparation: Mix ingredients, bake until golden brown.
